name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
schedule:
Tentative Schedule: 
February 21 (Thursday make-up class for March 8), Class Orientation
February 22, Writing Opinion Paragraphs, Style/Correctness
March 1, holiday
March 8, international conference, make up on February 21
March 15, Writing Arguments, Style/Actions
March 19 (Tuesday make-up class for May 10), Library Resources
March 22, Writing Arguments, Style/Character
March 29, Comparison/Contrast Essays, Style/Cohesion-Coherence
April 2 (Tuesday make-up class for May 24), Comparison/Contrast Essays, Style/Emphasis
April 5, holiday
April 12, Paraphrasing Exercises, Style/Motivation
April 19, Paraphrasing Exercises, Style/Global Coherence
April 26, Argumentative Essays, Organizing Arguments
May 3, Argumentative Essays, Incorporating Sources
May 10, entrance exam grading, make up on April 2
May 17, Writing Definitions, Style/Concision
May 24, international conference, make up on March 19
May 31, Writing Definitions, Style/Shape
June 7, holiday
June 14, Writing Summaries, Communicating Evidence Visually
June 21, term paper due
END
scorePolicy:
Final paper: 20% (5~7-page essay, double-spaced)
Writing homework: 40% (including required revisions)
Seat work, Quizzes, and Exercises: 30%
Final written exam: 10% (grammar and AWL)
END
